name: Personal Projects
body:
## Welcome to Viktor Odin GitHub Pages.

**Here are some of my personal projects created during my studies at the University Paris 7 Diderot**

### [Priority Inversion and Inheritance](https://github.com/ViktorOdin/Personal-Projects/tree/master/Inversion_Heritage_Priorite)
__The purpose of this little project was to create a priority inversion between 3 threads and detect it. Then, with priority inheritance, successfully prevent this inversion and detect it also.__

### [Spiral Matrix Filling](https://github.com/ViktorOdin/Personal-Projects/tree/master/Colimacon)
__The project goal was to fill a spiral matrix, the size of the matrix is ​​entered by the user.__

### [measure of creation, termination and context change](https://github.com/ViktorOdin/Personal-Projects/tree/master/Clock_GetTime)
__The purpose of this project was to measure the time of creation and termination of forks and threads. And finally to measure the time of a context change with pipes and semaphores between two forks and two threads.__
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
